title: Malta Davis Cup team
text:
The Malta men's national tennis team represents <a href="Malta">Malta</a> in <a href="Davis%20Cup">Davis Cup</a> <a href="tennis">tennis</a> competition and are governed by the <a href="Malta%20Tennis%20Federation">Malta Tennis Federation</a>.
Malta currently compete in the Europe/Africa Zone of Group IV.
History.
Malta competed in its first Davis Cup in <a href="1986%20Davis%20Cup">1986</a>.
